description: Large, tri-lobed leaf with hazel nut-like fruit, Lib. Tertium, p.862, Title, Xylon, sive Gossipium above figure. Also Lib. secundum, p.415, with same title
title: Xylon, sive Gossipium, Xylon, sive Gossipium, from "Commentarii in Sex Libros Pedacii Dioscoridis", 1565
